comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content:
German Cruiser, the first to be named after a city, and all subsequent cruisers were.
1915 Operated in Baltic.
17 December 1915 Sunk by mines.

comment.author: 15461861@N06
comment._content:
The cruiser was build 1903 at Bremen shipyard A.G Weser
Since 1904 it was operated in Wilhelmshaven
Between 1904 and 1912 the main Region it was used was North- and Southamercia as a Stationcruiser for the Colonies.
